document_data.name: ''Amulet of Elemental Torment''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amulets of elemental torment''''' were minor [[enchanted]] [[amulet]]s from the [[Emerald Grove]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: The item was a delicate chain with numerous [[gemstone]]s, each gleamed with energy of elemental magic.
document_data.Powers: The amulet's [[enchantment]] allowed for a spellcaster to fling spells while dealing additional damage channeled from an element they physically were in contact with at the time of the casting. Such elemental magics could be harnessed through fires, acid, water, among others.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Arron]], a [[halfling]] [[druid]] merchant from the Emerald Grove in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
